name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ生誕祭2024 】ーFantasia of Bremenー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [pFZiKpoxuvw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs a fragment of the song 'Dramaturgy' on a stylized stage with floating debris.
Transition sequence with a black screen leading into the narrative section.
Omaru Polka narrates a story about a donkey, a dog, and cats heading to Bremen, accompanied by paper-doll style visuals.
Takanashi Kiara, Inugami Korone, and Nekomata Okayu perform a cheerful 'farm' parody of 'Dramaturgy' in a castle setting.
The characters have a short dialogue about the song before Kiara shifts the tone.
Kiara leads a high-energy rock performance of 'Dramaturgy' as the group prepares to head to the festival in Bremen.
The group performs the thematic song 'Bremen e Ikou' as the stage transitions to a pub setting.
The group enters a pub and discusses their next steps. Aki Rosenthal joins the group on stage.
Houshou Marine appears as a 'great thief,' leading to a theatrical sequence of dialogue and a dramatic song performance.
The full group performs the finale of 'Bremen e Ikou' as Marine joins their cause.

subtitles.original: あっちへふらふら、こっちへふらふらとさ
subtitles.english: Wandering here and there, wandering there and here

subtitles.original: その目に映るのは...
subtitles.english: In those eyes reflected is...

subtitles.original: ブレーメンを目指して旅立った、ロバ、犬、猫たち。
subtitles.english: The donkey, dog, and cats that set out on a journey to Bremen.

subtitles.original: 自分の輝ける場所を求めて歩く足取りは、不安と期待の風が吹くけれど、
subtitles.english: Though the wind of anxiety and expectation blows on their steps as they seek a place to shine,

subtitles.original: 同時に、今まで感じたことのない高揚感と自由。満ちていました。
subtitles.english: At the same time, they were filled with a sense of excitement and freedom never felt before.

subtitles.original: さあ、進もう。愉快な声が聞こえる方へ。
subtitles.english: Now, let's move forward. Towards the direction of cheerful voices.

subtitles.original: 楽しい農場、
subtitles.english: Happy farm,

subtitles.original: 楽しい農場、
subtitles.english: Happy farm,

subtitles.original: 楽しいだけの農場
subtitles.english: Just a happy farm

subtitles.original: 愉快な農場、
subtitles.english: Cheerful farm,

subtitles.original: 愉快な農場、
subtitles.english: Cheerful farm,

subtitles.original: 愉快なだけの農場
subtitles.english: Just a cheerful farm

subtitles.original: お日様ポカポカ、
subtitles.english: The sun is warm and cozy,

subtitles.original: 楽しくて愉快なだけの農場
subtitles.english: Just a happy and cheerful farm

subtitles.original: とっても長閑で、いい歌ですね！
subtitles.english: It's a very peaceful and nice song!

subtitles.original: これはこれは、勿体無いお言葉。でも、
subtitles.english: Why, those are generous words. But...

subtitles.original: 本当にそう思いますか？
subtitles.english: Do you really think so?

subtitles.original: ココ、ココ、こんなもんじゃない！
subtitles.english: This, this, it's not like this!

subtitles.original: ほとばしる俺のミュージック！
subtitles.english: My music is gushing out!

subtitles.original: ココ、ココ、こんな田舎で、
subtitles.english: In this, this, in this countryside,

subtitles.original: くすぶってる場合じゃねぇぜ！
subtitles.english: There's no time to be smoldering!

subtitles.original: もっと自分を試したい！
subtitles.english: I want to test myself more!

subtitles.original: もっと自由な音楽で！
subtitles.english: With more free music!

subtitles.original: オーバー、ドライブかけたら止まらないぜ！
subtitles.english: Once I put it into overdrive, I won't stop!

subtitles.original: ロックンロール！
subtitles.english: Rock and roll!

subtitles.original: あの、本当はこういう曲が好きなんです。ベイビー！
subtitles.english: Um, actually, I like this kind of music. Baby!

subtitles.original: 一緒においでよ、ブレーメンでフェスがあってさ！
subtitles.english: Come along with me, there's a festival in Bremen!

subtitles.original: よかったら共に参らぬか？
subtitles.english: If you'd like, shall we go together?

subtitles.original: 一緒に行ってるぜ！
subtitles.english: We're going together!

subtitles.original: このサウンドが宝の山さ！
subtitles.english: This sound is a mountain of treasure!

subtitles.original: オイエス、正面突破でかっ飛ばしてやるぜ！
subtitles.english: Oh yes, I'm gonna blast through with a frontal assault!

subtitles.original: ブレーメン、イェー！
subtitles.english: Bremen, yeah!

subtitles.original: サンキュー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ブレーメンへ行こう、なりたい自分に正直に
subtitles.english: Let's go to Bremen, be honest with the self you want to be

subtitles.original: なれる世界を目指し行こう、
subtitles.english: Let's head for a world where you can become that,

subtitles.original: 一緒に！
subtitles.english: Together!

subtitles.original: ねぇみんな、このお店に入らない？
subtitles.english: Hey everyone, shall we go into this shop?

subtitles.original: 一息ついたら作戦会議をしましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's have a strategy meeting after we take a breather.

subtitles.original: ここはなんだか吠えるのに丁度いい場所だ。
subtitles.english: This seems like a good place to howl.

subtitles.original: アオー！
subtitles.english: Awoo!

subtitles.original: ついにメインディッシュか。
subtitles.english: Finally, the main dish.

subtitles.original: 漆黒の闇夜に光る天使の微笑みを掴むための
subtitles.english: I want to play the recipient for catching

subtitles.original: レシピエントを奏でたい。
subtitles.english: the angel's smile shining in the pitch-black night.

subtitles.original: ドキドキ！ロックンロール！
subtitles.english: Thump-thump! Rock and roll!

subtitles.original: ハイ、ベイビーベイビー！
subtitles.english: Hi, baby baby!

subtitles.original: ふっ、なかなか面白そうな連中じゃないか。
subtitles.english: Heh, they look like quite an interesting bunch.

subtitles.original: えっ、あなた誰？
subtitles.english: Wait, who are you?

subtitles.original: 変態？変態って初めて見た。
subtitles.english: A pervert? I've never seen a pervert before.

subtitles.original: 変態じゃない！私こそは、
subtitles.english: I'm not a pervert! I am the one

subtitles.original: 強きを挫き、弱きを助ける、正義の大泥棒だ！
subtitles.english: who crushes the strong and helps the weak, the great thief of justice!

subtitles.original: 暗闇紛れ、頂戴する、
subtitles.english: Slipping through the darkness, I'll take them all:

subtitles.original: 秘宝財宝、お宝全て
subtitles.english: the secret treasures, riches, and gems.

subtitles.original: 狙い付けるわ、金持ち共。
subtitles.english: I'll target the wealthy.

subtitles.original: それだけが私の勇気！
subtitles.english: That alone is my courage!

subtitles.original: わかったらありがたみをマルっと置いてさっさと立ち去りな！
subtitles.english: If you understand, leave your gratitude behind and get out of here quickly!

subtitles.original: そんなこと言われても、俺たち、お金なんてナッシング！
subtitles.english: Even if you say that, we have no money at all!

subtitles.original: えっ、そうなの？
subtitles.english: Eh, is that so?

subtitles.original: あいや、騙されないぞ！
subtitles.english: Ah, no, I won't be fooled!

subtitles.original: 貧乏人がそんなに楽しそうに笑えるはずがない！
subtitles.english: There's no way poor people could laugh so happily!

subtitles.original: 貧しかった幼い頃、お腹を空かせた私は絶望の底にいた。
subtitles.english: When I was poor as a child, starving, I was at the bottom of despair.

subtitles.original: え、なんか始まっちゃった。
subtitles.english: Oh, something started.

subtitles.original: だからこそ私は、そんな人たちを笑顔にしたかった。
subtitles.english: That's why I wanted to make those people smile.

subtitles.original: それなのに…あぁ、それだけなのに…！
subtitles.english: And yet... oh, even though it was just that...!

subtitles.original: 何故こんなに胸が痛む！
subtitles.english: Why does my heart ache so much!

subtitles.original: 何故私はこんな方法しか知らないんだ…！
subtitles.english: Why do I only know this way...!

subtitles.original: 人を笑顔にする方法？
subtitles.english: A way to make people smile?

subtitles.original: ふっ、愚問だな。
subtitles.english: Heh, a foolish question.

subtitles.original: 僕にもわかってきたかも。
subtitles.english: I think I've come to understand too.

subtitles.original: でも、一人じゃできないだろ？
subtitles.english: But, you can't do it alone, right?

subtitles.original: だから、僕たちと！
subtitles.english: That's why, with us!

subtitles.original: ブレーメンへ行こう、僕らだけじゃない、
subtitles.english: Let's go to Bremen, not just for us,

subtitles.original: 笑顔のため
subtitles.english: but for the smiles

subtitles.original: 歌を歌おう、きっとできるはずさ。
subtitles.english: Let's sing a song, I'm sure we can do it.

subtitles.original: さあ行こう、ブレーメン！
subtitles.english: Now let's go, Bremen!
